info.title: Voucherify API
info.description: Voucherify promotion engine REST API. Please see https://docs.voucherify.io/docs for more details.

post.description: The organization user can remove consumer data permanently from the Voucherify system by using this API method. It deletes all customer data and connected resources. It makes the customer profile forgotten by Voucherify.

200.description: Returns a permanent deletion object and status of the deletion.

404.description: Returns an error indicating that a customer with given ID was not found.

value.details: Cannot find customer with id cust_W8n9I8pJDXlM69j49iKJeYp

CustomersPermanentDeletionCreateResponse.title: Customers Permanent Deletion Create Response Body

created_at.description: Timestamp representing the date and time when the customer was requested to be deleted in ISO 8601 format.

related_object_id.description: Unique customer ID that is being deleted.

data_json.description: Statistics summarizing the number of related information that was deleted.

object.description: The type of the object represented by JSON.

key.description: Short string describing the kind of error which occurred.

message.description: A human-readable message providing a short description of the error.

details.description: A human-readable message providing more details about the error.

request_id.description: This ID is useful when troubleshooting and/or finding the root cause of an error response by our support team.

resource_id.description: Unique resource ID that can be used in another endpoint to get more details.

error.description: Includes additional information about the error.

message.description: The message configured by the user in a validation rule.
